title: What is happening with the Harris Teeter in Carolina Beach?  The \future site of Harris Teeter\" sign is no longer there. "
text:
Here's a link to a recent blog post at StarNewsOnline.com that
should answer your question:



http://business.blogs.starnewsonline.com/11432/dont-start-counting-the-days-for-the-carolina-beach-harris-teeter-just-yet/
